projects.name: StreamLine
projects.description: A real-time messaging web app that enables seamless communication. Built using Socket.io for real-time data transfer and peer-to-peer connections. Designed with a sleek and intuitive interface for an enhanced user experience.

projects.name: LearnSync (Group Project)
projects.description: An interactive learning platform built for students and teachers to connect, compete, and grow through real-time coding contests. Offers dual-user problem solving, progress tracking, and a clean, responsive UI. Built with a focus on collaboration and skill development.

projects.name: PromoCraft
projects.description: A creative campaign builder designed for marketing teams to craft, schedule, and monitor promotions seamlessly. Includes performance tracking and customizable templates to boost productivity and consistency across channels.
